bio:
Meet [BBPOISON], an artist whose work is deeply rooted in emotions and reflects the sorrow and sadness that they have experienced.  Their work is a powerful and moving representation of the many emotions they have dealt with, including loneliness and depression.  Through their art, they strive to create a safe space for others to explore their own emotions and to connect with their own experiences.  

With a unique style and deep understanding of the human condition, [BBPOISON] has become a respected and admired figure in the art world.  Whether you are moved by the raw emotion in their work or touched by the vulnerability that they express, their art is sure to resonate with you.
